subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Carolina Kluft of Sweden withdrew from the 60-meter hurdles and the long jump at the GE Galan indoor meet in Stockholm because of a right thigh injury. Kluft, the reigning European, world and Olympic heptathlon champion, could miss the rest of the indoor season. The Swedish team doctor said an examination indicated it was internal bleeding, and that it would require three to four weeks of rest.
